name: Pride - Team 19
description:
Pride is a 2D boss battle for tolerance against bigotry.

As Pamela Pride, you get trapped by the horrific Karen La Peine as she tries to humiliate you for not fitting her old-school view of the world. It's time to show her that the world is richer than she thinks ! 

Stand proud for you and all those living outside of conventions !

FEATURES

  • Play as Pamela Pride, swift as the wind, sharp as a knife, sturdy has her resolve
  • Fight a vicious boss who will stop at nothing to wear your mental health down
  • Open Karen's mind with the smoothness of your hairs
  • Shifts her views with your long-range arguments

Developed by : Nolan JUTARD - Victor HAMCHA - Léopold HILLION

Design by : Lucas SANCHEZ -  Louis FOUERE

Graphics by : Yanis GIARRAFFA

Produced by : Maxime GAULIER - Tristan SOLARO

**This game still in development**
